name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance – OST Essentials
detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1059340/Kingdom_Come_Deliverance__Festival_Suite/


Steam Exclusive Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/976180/Deliverance_The_Making_of_Kingdom_Come/


About the Game

Listen to the award-winning soundtrack, containing the essential tracks of orchestrated music for Kingdom Come: Deliverance.

  • 01 Skalitz 1403 (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 02 People of the Land (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 03 Till Our Heads Turn White (Composed by Adam Sporka / Lyrics by Ondřej Malota)
  • 04 In the Name of the King (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 05 Beer and Women (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 06 The Talmberg Theme (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 07 Skalitz Is Dying (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 08 St. James (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 09 Sigismund's Army at the Gates (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 10 Lady Steph and Henry (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 11 Losing Father's Sword (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 12 Rattay Feasts (Composed by Adam Sporka)
  • 13 Good Luck, Son (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 14 Fighting Runt (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 15 The River Sasau Theme (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 16 From Dusk to Sunrise (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 17 Footpad's Arrival (Composed by Adam Sporka)
  • 18 Talmberg Captured (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 19 Steph Is Safe (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 20 Things Worth Living for (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 21 Brotherhood of Bravery (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 22 Dream About Father (Composed by Jan Valta)
  • 23 Poverty and Famine (Composed by Adam Sporka / Lyrics by Daniel Vávra)

TOTAL TIME 50:12

Produced by Jan Valta & Adam Sporka

Performed by Warhorse Studio Orchestra conducted by Jan Valta
Recorded at Dvořák Hall in Rudolfinum, Prague
Sound engineer: Ondřej Urban

Tracks 3, 12, and 23 performed by Bakchus

short_description: Kingdom Come: Deliverance is a story-driven open-world RPG that immerses you in an epic adventure in the Holy Roman Empire. Avenge your parents' death as you battle invading forces, go on game-changing quests, and make influential choices.
reviews:
“Jan Valta and Adam Sporka have done an excellent job crafting an orchestral score.”
ZAM

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660, AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUND BLASTER Zx
  • Additional Notes: Pretty much any machine able to play MP3
